Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Longport in 1978...
Injured on 8/29/1978 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 6/26/1979 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/2/1980 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 7/18/1982 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Earned first career win on 4/3/1983...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1983, going 20-13, 3.39 ERA...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/16/1984 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1986, winning 2 games with a 1.69 ERA...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1987, going 3-1, 1.13...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/9/1989 to a 6-year deal worth $8,888,000 per year...
